name: rsa_verify
description: Implementation of rsa verify for Circom

scripts.circuit:setup: npx snarkjs setup -c bin/rsa_verify.json --pk groth16_zkey_prove.json --vk groth16_zkey_verify.json --protocol groth
scripts.circuit:witness: npx snarkjs calculatewitness -c bin/rsa_verify.json -i inputs/input.json -w witness/witness.json
scripts.circuit:prove: npx snarkjs proof -w witness/witness.json --pk groth16_zkey_prove.json -p proofs/proof.json --pub publicSignals/public.json
scripts.circuit:verify: npx snarkjs verify --vk groth16_zkey_verify.json -p proofs/proof.json --pub publicSignals/public.json

author: jacksoom
